title: Dvorak - Cert a Kaca (The Devil and Kate) [1981]  FLAC
description: Please seed! Antonín Dvořák - Čert a Káča (The Devil and Kate) Op. 112, B.201 Libretto: Adolf Wenig Opera in three acts, sung in Czech Recorded 1979, first release 1981, CD 1993 https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anton%C3%ADn_Dvo%C5%99%C3%A1k https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Devil_and_Kate http://www.antonin-dvorak.cz/en/devil-and-kate With art work. Libretto: Czech, English, French, German Shepherd Jirka . . . . . . Miloš Ježil Kate . . . . . . . . . . . Anna Barová Her mother . . . . . . . . Daniela Suryová Devil Marbuel. . . . . . . Richard Novák Lucifer. . . . . . . . . . Jaroslav Horáček Devil the Gate-keeper. . . Jan Hladík Devil the Guard. . . . . . Aleš Šťáva Princess . . . . . . . . . Brigita Šulcová Chambermaid. . . . . . . . Natalie Romanová - Achaladze Marshall . . . . . . . . . Pavel Kamas Musician . . . . . . . . . Oldřich Polášek Village people, Youth and girls, Musicians, Devils, Courtiers, Folk backstage Brno Janáček Opera Chorus Sbor opery Státního divadla v Brně, Josef Pančík Brno Janáček Opera Orchestra (Brno Philharmonic) Orchestr opery Státního divadla v Brně, Jiří Pinkas The Devil and Kate CD1, act 1 01 Overture 02 Act 1: Why so early, shepherd 03 O me, little shepherd poor 04 Dance (Valse) 05 Isn't it enraging? 06 Good evening! 07 May I offer you a drink, please? 08 Hurray! Jirka is here again! 09 I've been kicked out! 10 It is somewhat out-of-the-way The Devil and Kate CD2, act 2 and act 3 01 Act 2: Overture 02 Glory to the might of gold 03 Shall I forever listen to your larm? 04 Who is it you, brother, carry what does it all mean? 05 What seek you? What do you want here? 06 Everywhere I heard but laments 07 He might, perhaps, carry her home! 08 Kate, get ready now! 09 Devilish Dance / Dance of Hell 10 How do you like it here in hell? 11 Act 3: Overture (Polonaise) 12 Now sad the castle 13 What can I do my gracious princess? 14 He is here, the shepherd, Your Grace! 15 Here I am, what is it, Jirka? 16 Take a seat here, my dear princess 17 Stroj se, knezno, se mnou pujdes 18 Steady, princess, you go with me! 19 For your gracious kindness to us http://www.allmusic.com/album/dvorak-kate-and-the-devil-cert-a-k%C3%A1cal-mw0001940288
